creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: image of two-sailed junk towing dinghy; faint peach colored sky; blue gradient water; blue reflection below boat
marks: Top edge: #8 | Simple course finished LRC: [Hiroshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: A Junk, printing order no. 8
